bioconda.name: admixture
bioconda.summary: ADMIXTURE is a software tool for maximum likelihood estimation of individual ancestries from multilocus SNP genotype datasets.

biocontainers.name: admixture
biocontainers.summary: ADMIXTURE is a software tool for maximum likelihood estimation of individual ancestries from multilocus SNP genotype datasets.

biotools.summary: Maximum likelihood estimation of individual ancestries from multilocus SNP genotype datasets. It uses the same statistical model as STRUCTURE but calculates estimates using a fast numerical optimization algorithm.

bioschemas.name: Admixture
bioschemas.summary: Maximum likelihood estimation of individual ancestries from multilocus SNP genotype datasets. It uses the same statistical model as STRUCTURE but calculates estimates using a fast numerical optimization algorithm.
